doctor.name: Asso. Prof. Dr. Towhidul Islam
doctor.info: Asso. Prof. Dr. Towhidul Islam is a Pediatric Surgeon in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Pediatric Surgery). He is a Associate Professor & Head, Pediatric Surgery at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal. Practicing hour of Asso. Prof. Dr. Towhidul Islam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal is 1pm to 2pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: 955 & 109, Shahid Nazrul Islam Road, Alekanda, Banglabazar, Barisal

doctor.name: Dr. Gazi Mahmud Ul Hasan Rusho
doctor.info: Dr. Gazi Mahmud Ul Hasan Rusho is a skilled pediatric surgeon in Barisal, specializing in surgical care for infants, children, and adolescents. He holds an MBBS and MS in Pediatric Surgery and currently serves as an Assistant Registrar in Pediatric Surgical Oncology at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Rusho is experienced in managing a wide range of childhood surgical conditions, including congenital anomalies, hernias, hydroceles, undescended testis, intestinal obstructions, appendicitis, and pediatric tumors. With a compassionate and child-friendly approach, he ensures safe and effective surgical treatment for young patients. He is available for consultation at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal, located at 955 & 109, Shahid Nazrul Islam Road, Alekanda, Banglabazar, from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM on Monday, Tuesday, and Friday. For expert pediatric surgery in Barisal, Dr. Gazi Mahmud Ul Hasan Rusho is a trusted and reliable choice.

chamber.address: 955 & 109, Shahid Nazrul Islam Road, Alekanda, Banglabazar, Barisal
